com.adobe.web.client

Class HttpWebClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.web.client.HttpWebClient

  • public class HttpWebClient
extends java.lang.Object
    To be used as a http web client to generate send and recieve requests and response.
    Author:
    Ramanshu Mahaur
